wikipedia_page.main: Christine Marjorie Gwyther (born 1959) is a Welsh Labour politician.  She held the Carmarthen West and South Pembrokeshire constituency seat in the  National Assembly for Wales from 1999 to 2007. She failed to retain her seat in the 2007 Welsh Assembly Elections, losing to Conservative candidate Angela Burns; she lost again in the 2011 election to Angela Burns 2011 elections.
